comments.en:
Give your business a boost with this professional-quality performer! The HP Color LaserJet 4650 features all the basics you need for excellent printing, plus you can add on a host of helpful options (such as networking) as your organization grows. Fast colour laser printer which does 17 pages/min in both color and grayscale. As the Epson AcuLaser C4000 it processes all four colours simultaneously. No duplex supported.

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Various flavors are available, with networking, extra trays, etc.

Consumables/Refills: 1 print cartridge per color (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, blacK)
